install.name: full_screen_2
install.author: JoomSpirit
install.description:
IMPORTANT : Read the settings for this template

All informations is in your zip template in "help" directory : you must just open the manual.html
You will find in how to configure the template, use the typography, the module positions for your modules, how to display tooltips, or another mootools effect of this template.

field.name: width
field.label: Web site width
field.description: Enter the width for your web site in px or % and without space. Example : 900px or 95% . Default : 95%

field.name: width_content
field.label: Width for the middle website : your content
field.description: Enter the width in px or % and without space. Example : 980px or 80% . Default : 980px

field.name: width_left
field.label: Width of left column
field.description: Enter the width for your left column in px or % and without space. Example : 260px or 20%

field.name: width_right
field.label: Width of right column
field.description: Enter the width for your right column in px or % and without space. Example : 260px or 20%

field.name: user1_width
field.label: Width of user1
field.description: Enter the width for user1 in px or % and without space. Example : 180px or 33% . Default : 31%

field.name: user3_width
field.label: Width of user3
field.description: Enter the width for user3 in px or % and without space. Example : 180px or 33% . Default : 31%

field.name: user4_width
field.label: Width of user4
field.description: Enter the width for user4 in px or % and without space. Example : 180px or 33% . Default : 31%

field.name: user6_width
field.label: Width of user6
field.description: Enter the width for user6 in px or % and without space. Example : 180px or 33% . Default : 31%

field.name: height_container
field.label: Min height for the container
field.description: Enter the minimal height for the middle web site in px (only a number). Example : 500 or 350 . Default : 500

field.name: separator
field.label: Height above and below the header
field.description: Enter the height in px (only a number). Example : 40 or 60 . Default : 60

field.name: color_link
field.label: Set the color for the active links
field.description: Please select the color for the links that you would like to display. Default : #336699

field.name: font
field.label: Font for your menu and article title

field.name: fontSize
field.label: Default font size
field.description: Set the default font size when template is loaded for the first time

field.name: one_slide
field.label: Enable slideshow
field.description: Choose if you want display a slideshow or only one image

field.name: slide_interval
field.label: Slide interval
field.description: Enter the time for each image in millisecondes. Default : 8000
